rules:
1․ Age Check
Must be 18＋ to join and drink․ No exceptions․ If you're caught lying‚ you're out․

2․ Drink at Your Own Pace
No peer pressure․ If someone doesnt wanna drink （or needs a break）‚ respect that․
Water counts too․ Hydration gangǃ

3․ Respect is Law
Keep it friendly and respectful no harassment‚ creepy behavior‚ or crossing personal boundaries․
Consent applies in VR too․ Dont get weird with avatars or voices․

4․ Mic Etiquette
No ear-shattering noises‚ mic spam‚ or screaming into the void․
If you're slurring too hard or being disruptive‚ take a break․

5․ Keep the Vibes Up
Drama‚ trolling‚ or bringing real-world fights into the party? Nah․ Youll be muted or booted․
We're here to relax‚ laugh‚ and vibe not argue․

6․ Avatar Limits
No flashing⁄strobing avatars or overly NSFW ones unless everyone agrees․

7․ Know When to Log Off
If you're wasted and starting to spiral‚ its okay to dip․ Rest up‚ well see you next session․

8․ Golden Rule of VRChat
Dont be a tool․ Treat people like people behind every avatar is a real human․
infoBoard:
Zentaka<\color> is a multinational cybernetics and defense conglomerate specializing in human augmentation‚ neural interfacing‚ and advanced bio-mechanical systems․ With headquarters in the Neo-Tokyo Arcology and operations in over 80 territories‚ Zentaka<\color>remains at the forefront of post-human innovation‚ seamlessly integrating man and machine․

Founded in 2047 by visionary industrialist Epsi‚ the company rose to prominence through exclusive military contracts and rapid advancements in neural mesh technology․ Instrumental to Zentaka's<\color> cutting-edge developments is REDACTED‚ a master schematics engineer whose designs have shaped the next generation of cybernetic systems․ Today‚ Zentaka's subsidiaries span civilian prosthetics‚ surveillance AI‚ private security‚ and consciousness preservation․
